name: Rescue Space Miners
description:
Rescue Space Miners - alpha version

This game were made with the initial purpose of practicing code and testing some algorithms. But I kinda liked it! So I am making it a real game. It is a short simple game for mobile (but works in web) where you have to rescue people lost in the middle of a group of asteroids using a module of a bigger ship. I am still defining some key elements of gameplay such levels of difficult and elements you can collect optionally - also how to evaluate the final results. So I hope you enjoy it and give me some feedback!

It will necessary to take a look in the docs because the tutorial is not ready, you will be lost in space...

Production:

  • Code: me
  • Graphics: me
  • Soundtrack: Deepspace from Cyberleaf
  • Sound Effects: free assets from several creators
